isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Power Salem Vent W/PRO SLEEPER

svcproc.title: Power Salem Vent W/PRO SLEEPER
svcproc.para: With the vent switch in the low or high position, power flows from battery stud B2 through circuit 14AK, 14AV, fuse F10 - B, circuit 14AX, fuse 582 - B, circuit 76K, and 76M to the Power Salem Vent. The ground path is circuit 76 - GM, 11 - GAF, 11 - GBC, 11 - GBD, and 11 - GBE to ground adapter (454).
